metadata.name: Wudhu - when doing masah of the feet

arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ ثَبِّتْنِيْ عَلَى الصِّرَاطِ يَوْمَ تَزِلُّ فِيْهِ الْاَقْدَامُ
translation: O Lord! Keep me firm on the Bridge (to Paradise] on the Day when the feet will slip,
and help me in my efforts to do things which will please You,
transliteration: allāhumma thabbitnī `alaṣ ṣirāṭi yawma tazillu fīhil aqdām
